channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Image Hover Effects – Elementor Addon

item.title: CVE-2021-24264|2024-08-03T19:28:22.758Z -- unknown -- image%20hover%20effects%20%E2%80%93%20elementor%20addon
item.description: The “Image Hover Effects – Elementor Addon” WordPress Plugin before 1.3.4 has a widget that is vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.
